annotations.config.title=Annotations configuration panel annotations.config.display.title=Annotation display annotations.config.type.title=Annotation type annotations.config.activate.title=Annotation activation annotations.config.activate.explanation=The following two settings allow you to configure which locations annotations are active in. The first setting specifies the general rule, while the second list specifies the locations for which the rule shouldn't apply. For example, activated "yes" and exception locations "XWiki" and "Main" means that annotations will be active on all locations except for "XWiki" and "Main". As an opposite example, using activated "no" and exception locations "Documents" means that annotations will be active only for the "Documents" location. annotations.config.type.explanation=Add properties to this class if you want extra properties for your annotations. admin.annotations=Annotations admin.annotations.description=Configure the page annotations
